item.description:
Join us for our monthly gathering with Michael Bergonzi aka The Wheatgrass King!

A casual, informative & enlightening conversation with Michael on the benefits of sprouts and how to get started! Michael has been in the alternative health field since 1990 and is internationally known as the pre-eminent wheatgrass & sprout grower. The last 10 of his 20 year career at Hippocrates Health Institute teaching others about growing wheatgrass and lecturing on why juicing is essential in today’s world.  Learn all about what juicers are best, why greens are essential for optimum health, what to juice, how to juice, how long to juice as well as eating simple & with better choices as well as a basic overview on how to sprout with an emphasis on wheatgrass.

Learn more about Michael:

www.wheatgrassgreenhouse.com
item.name: Sprouting Basics with Michael Bergonzi
